code: import*as types from'../constants/actionType';var initialState=0;var myReducer=function myReducer(){var value=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.SORT_LIST:return action.value;default:return value;}};export default myReducer;
